heroTitle: Medical experts orchestrating every step of your journey
heroSubtitle: A bilingual team of medical experts coordinates assessment, pathway design, escort execution, and follow-up so every visit stays transparent, documented, and calm.
heroImageAlt: Medical experts aligning a cross-border care plan
heroImageCaption: Clinical operations hub · Hong Kong & Shenzhen
valuesSubtitle: Every touchpoint is led by medical experts for secure, traceable execution.
value1Body: One team across Hong Kong and Shenzhen with real-time insight into capacity, cadence, and travel constraints.
value2Body: Multi-specialty experts validate records and explain why a pathway is chosen.
value3Body: Each visit becomes a documented log, task list, and reminder for long-term stewardship.
servicesIntro: Tap to review Single Session or Annual Stewardship models.
singleBody: Built for first-time or episodic cross-border needs. Your medical expert and escort concierge keep booking, visit day, and recap under control.
singleScope1: Deep intake: consolidate history, medication, and family expectations.
singleScope2: Medical experts outline objectives, risks, and pathway options.
singleScope3: Onsite escort: manage registration, diagnostics, reporting, and live family updates.
singleScope4: Within 72 hours deliver recap and next-step reminders.
singleOutput1: Cross-border cadence map with same-day task tracking.
singleOutput2: Medical expert recap (audio/text) plus critical Q&A.
singleOutput3: Follow-up or imaging / lab scheduling cues.
singleImageCaption: Single session support with medical expert oversight.
annualBody: Designed for individuals and families needing year-round partnership: medical expert council + client success stewards.
annualScope1: Personal cadence: quarterly reviews and fast-track bilingual consults.
annualScope2: Family oversight: 2–4 member health map plus travel/school coordination.
annualScope3: Multidisciplinary case boards uniting imaging, labs, and specialist notes.
annualScope4: Real-time reminders for medication, reviews, and screening windows.
annualOutput1: Dedicated client success partner with 24/7 WhatsApp/WeChat log.
annualOutput2: Digital family health dashboard and secure archive.
annualOutput3: Medical experts join calls or debriefs to keep strategy aligned.
processIntro: Four modular stages—engage individually or end-to-end.
processAssessBody: Medical experts and health managers interview together to define objectives, risks, and timing.
processAssessList1: Compile medical history, imaging, and prescriptions for a data baseline.
processAssessList2: Surface family considerations to set cadence and communication rules.
processAssessList3: Flag cross-border constraints such as insurance, immigration, or infection control.
processMatchBody: Build best-fit Hong Kong / Shenzhen hospitals and medical experts based on specialty, expectation, and wait time.
processMatchList1: Compare facility capability, language support, and wait windows.
processMatchList3: Prepare waiting-room and logistics plans for families.
processEscortBody: Escort specialists stay in sync with medical experts during the entire visit.
processEscortList1: Handle registration, queue management, and ad-hoc add-ons.
processEscortList2: Interpret medical expert guidance in real time and prep questions.
processEscortList3: Collect reports, medication, and imaging backups for secure upload.
processReviewBody: Within 72 hours, medical experts deliver structured recap plus forward plan.
processReviewList1: Decision log with terminology translation and action items.
processReviewList2: Automated reminders for reviews, imaging, or labs shared with family.
processReviewList3: Monitor travel or regulatory shifts and adjust proactively.
aboutBody: Nenya Health bridges Hong Kong and Shenzhen as a cross-border health concierge. We extend clinical teams—not replace them—by providing pathway planning, escort execution, data stewardship, and long-term tracking.
contactOfficeValue: Futian · Shenzhen ｜ Central · Hong Kong (by appointment)
contactQRNote: WeChat: scan to add “Nenya Health” (note: cross-border health)
servicesRedirectTitle: Services now live on the homepage
servicesRedirectBody: Head to the Homepage › Core Services tabs for full details on Single Session and Annual Stewardship.
aboutHeroSubtitle: A medical expert-led concierge team spanning Hong Kong and Shenzhen.
aboutBio1: Families need expert translators who balance clinical language with real concerns.
aboutBio2: Cadence control and documentation are as critical as diagnosis.
aboutBio3: Privacy and compliance enable long-term trust; every conversation is encrypted and logged.
aboutMission1: Medical expert council (medicine, surgery, pediatrics, imaging).
aboutMission2: Cross-border client success in Cantonese / Mandarin / English.
aboutMission3: Data operations + tech to sustain archives and reminders.
